# Readme generator

  [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

  ## Description
  a command line app to generate a readme

  clone, install dependencies 

  ## Usage
  run node index.js to init, answer,
